dt: {bc}to lock or secure with or as if with a key {bc}{sx|fasten||}: such as

{bc}to provide with identifying or explanatory cross-references
{bc}to enter or input (text or data) by using a keyboard
{bc}to be essential to {bc}play the most important part in
{bc}to vandalize by scratching with a key
{bc}to observe the position or movement of an opposing player in football in order to anticipate the play

dt.t: The middle linebacker was {wi}keying{/wi} on the halfback.

dt: {bc}a usually metal instrument by which the bolt of a lock is turned
{bc}any of various devices having the form or function of such a key
{bc}a means of gaining or preventing entrance, possession, or control
{bc}something that gives an explanation or identification or provides a solution
{bc}a list of words or phrases giving an explanation of symbols or abbreviations
{bc}an arrangement of the {d_link|salient|salient:1} characters of a group of plants or animals or of {d_link|taxa|taxon} designed to facilitate identification
{bc}a part to be depressed by a finger that serves as one unit of a keyboard
{bc}a representation of such a key (such as a space delineated on a touch screen)

dt.t: Tiny {wi}keys{/wi} on your iPhone's screen can be difficult to hit accurately.

dt: {bc}one of the levers of a keyboard musical instrument that actuates the mechanism and produces the tones
{bc}a lever that controls a vent in the side of a woodwind instrument or a valve in a brass instrument
{bc}a system of tones and harmonies generated from a hierarchical scale of seven tones based on a tonic
{bc}the tone or pitch of a voice
{bc}the predominant tone of a photograph with respect to its lightness or darkness
{bc}a decoration or charm resembling a key
{bc}a small switch for opening or closing an electric circuit
{bc}the set of instructions governing the encipherment and decipherment of messages
{bc}a free-throw area in basketball {bc}{sx|free throw lane||}

dt.t: a jump shot from the top of the {wi}key{/wi}

dt: {bc}a small piece of wood or metal used as a wedge or for preventing motion between parts

dt: {bc}any of the coral {d_link|islets|islet} off the southern coast of Florida

dt: {bc}a kilogram especially of marijuana or heroin

shortdef: a kilogram especially of marijuana or heroin

dt: {bc}a photographic compositing technique based on the separation of colors in the original images

shortdef: a photographic compositing technique based on the separation of colors in the original images; especially : blue screen

dt: {bc}an implement with a triangular pointed head at one end for piercing the tops of cans and often with a rounded head at the other end for opening bottles

shortdef: an implement with a triangular pointed head at one end for piercing the tops of cans and often with a rounded head at the other end for opening bottles

dt: {bc}a key for the identification of organisms based on a series of choices between alternative characters

shortdef: a key for the identification of organisms based on a series of choices between alternative characters

dt: {bc}a key on a computer keyboard that when pressed transmits various commands to the computer (such as to stop an active process or close a window)

The escape key originally transmitted a special type of character (the escape character) that marked subsequent data as being different in some way. For example, it might separate a command being sent to a printer from the actual data to be printed. More recent changes in technology have made this character less necessary, and the escape key has been adapted for other uses.

shortdef: a key on a computer keyboard that when pressed transmits various commands to the computer (such as to stop an active process or close a window)
